text:
Hi <@U04HLBUT9QC>, thanks for looking into this. Here’s a screenshot of the localhost extensions address. Seems to be in order. And yes, I’ve checked and I’m using the same portal in VS Code and browser.

Everything seems to be working fine local side, it’s just that for some reason the portal isn’t picking up the local dev env.

Hi all!
I created a JSON-based card a few months back working pretty well.
Recently saw this error message in HS. Does it mean that if I don’t migrate my existing card to a React-native card, my card will no longer work ?
I have zero experience in using React, so I’m panicking a little if it’s the case. Thanks for your help!

That's strange, it looks like everything should be in working order.  Lets try to dig a little deeper if you don't mind.
• Could you run `hs --version` and let me know what the output is?  
• Which browser are you using?  Is it chrome?
• In the response you get from `localhost:5173/extensions`, there is a field `callback`, in the example you provided it is `<http://hslocal.net:5173/card-frontend.js>` , could you navigate to that and let me know the output?

Sure, no problem, thanks for helping.
• `hs --version 5.1.3` 
• yes, Chrome Version 121.0.6167.160 (Official Build) (arm64)
• the output of the callback is in the screenshots

So all of that looks good as well :thinking_face:

If you navigate to the extension, are there any errors being logged in the developer console in the browser?
no, no errors in the console
Check if there are logs in the CRM card. Goto the private app and check the SF logs
